title: 181 Fremont | Luxury Fully Furnished 2BR/2BA W/ Stunning Views Avail
posting_body: 181 Fremont features 55 luxury residences on the top 17 floors designed by Orlando Diaz-Azcuy.
Fremont is the tallest residential building on the West Coast and has been Platinum LEED Certified by the U.S. Green Building Council with residents enjoying unparalleled views of the city.
Fremont is the only residential building offering direct access to the 5.4 acres of Salesforce Park and Transit Center via the 7th-story sky bridge.
Extraordinary terrace on the 52nd floor, two unique lounges, a library, conference room, and catering kitchen, and a fitness center with a yoga room.
Centrally located 181 Fremont offers a short walk to the Financial District, Downtown, Ferry Building, restaurants, and many more.
Easy access to Bart, Caltrain, and interstates 101 and 280.
With 600 ft in the air, residence 61C is capturing stunning views from every room, spanning the SF skyline to the Twin Peaks, Salesforce Park to the bay.

Designed with intention, including museum installation walls, floor to ceiling interior doors w/ hidden hinges & Italian Vali & Vali hardware, this expertly crafted home is made for upscale daily living.

Elegantly finished, 61C is upgraded with Expensive French Oak floors throughout, motorized Lutron window treatments, smart Lutron Lighting, and California Closets custom built-in closets in both bedrooms.
Control heat and cooling directly from the phone through the Nest thermostat.
At the touch of a button, summon the valet, book an amenity, or contact the concierge.
Beautifully decorated with Cassini Sofa, 65' Beovision Harmony 8K OLED TV, and the best in modern furniture and design, Design Within Reach furniture items.
Stunning Twin Peaks, Salesforce Park & Bay Views
* Modern kitchen w/ Italian cabinetry and top of the line Miele & SubZero appliances, including wine fridge
* Arabescato Corchia Marble in the Bath
* Central AC & Heat - Nest Thermostat (learns the temps you like, turns itself down when you're away, and has remote control through Wi-Fi)
That is Integral to Living One's Best Life at 181 Fremont
* Happy Hour & Unique Social Program for Residents Only available at 181 Fremont
* Owner pays for trash, sewer, and water.
* To see other available rentals go to https www compass com agents milan-jezdimirovic Scroll down to "Milan Jezdimirovic’s Listings"
